text: Guillermo Kane Guillermo Kane (born 12 October 1981) is an activist in the Workers' Party (Argentina). He studied at the University of Buenos Aires, and now teaches history there. From July 2015 to December 2016 he was a deputy in the legislature of Buenos Aires Province, as part of the rotation of seats by the Workers' Left Front. He is a candidate in the 2017 Argentine provincial elections. == External links == *Kane article on taking his seat (Spanish) *video of him speaking (Spanish) *biography (Spanish) Category:1981 births Category:People from Buenos Aires Province Category:Workers' Party (Argentina) politicians Category:University of Buenos Aires alumni Category:Living people Category:Argentine historians
title: Guillermo Kane
